title: Write the Formula
text: The formula is $$P=a+b+c$$, and we want to find $$b$$.
speech: The formula is    p is equal to, a plus b plus c , and we want to find  b .

, and we want to find   b

title: Isolate
text: To isolate $$b$$, we can subtract a and c from both sides to get $$P-a-c=b$$.
speech: To isolate  b , we can subtract a and c from both sides to get    p, minus a minus c is equal to b .
pacedSpeech: , we can subtract a and c from both sides to get     p, minus a minus c is equal to b
